Workload.name: Workload
Workload.description: Represents the time series for work item volume and average handle time from aggregation and forecasting processes.

EndDateTime.description: The end date and time of the time series represented by the Workload object.

IsOmni.description: Indicates that the workload is Omni-based.

StartDateTime.description: The start date and time of the time series represented by the Workload object.

TimeZone.description: The time zone associated with the workload. Possible values are the time zones supported by Workforce Engagement.
